slides.title: Ruby Code Example
content:
# frozen_string_literal: true

class HelloWorld
  def greet(name)
    puts "Hello, #{name}!"
  end
end

hello = HelloWorld.new
hello.greet('World')

slides.title: Regular Content
content: This is regular bullet point content
No code here, just plain text

slides.title: Performance Benchmark
content:
require 'benchmark'

Benchmark.bm do |x|
  x.report('frozen:') do
    1_000_000.times { 'Hello'.freeze }
  end
  x.report('mutable:') do
    1_000_000.times { 'Hello'.dup }
  end
end
The frozen version should be faster!
